moa.classifiers

Class AbstractEnsemble

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        • moa.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
          • moa.classifiers.AbstractEnsemble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, moa.classifiers.Classifier, Ensemble, moa.gui.AWTRenderable, moa.MOAObject, moa.options.OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OnlineBagging

    public abstract class AbstractEnsemble
extends moa.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
implements Ensemble
    Abstract Classifier.

    Parameters:

    • -r : Seed for random behaviour of the classifier.
    • -l : Classifier to train
    • -s : The number of models in the ensemble
    • -d : Parameter used to encourage more or less diversity
    Author:
    Luis H. P. Mendes (luishpmendes@gmail.com)
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • trainOnInstanceImpl

        public abstract void trainOnInstanceImpl(weka.core.Instance inst,
                       double lambda)
        Trains this ensemble incrementally using the given instance.

        The reason for ...Impl methods: ease programmer burden by not requiring them to remember calls to super in overridden methods. Note that this will produce compiler errors if not overridden.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be used for training
        lambda - parameter used to encourage more or less diversity
